text: History of HubSpot question: If you have a page thats published, then you make a update to that page and then schedule it for later, did it always unpublished the page? To my knowledge it has, but I have someone asking if at one point this wasn’t always the case.
I think it always has, but Because of the fact you can schedule a page after it’s already published, I feel like what it SHOULD do is schedule the changes to the page. (and NOT unpublish the page)
